OrgName.entry: MILLENNIUM CONFERENCE AND FUNCTION CENTRE - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: A large, modern hexagonal hall (approx.13m x 15m), with hard wood floor available for conferences, presentations and lectures. Can be booked for short lunch time meetings 12-2.30pm, and day and evening functions. Raised rostrum for speaker. Blackout facility, overhead projector, moveable large screen, flip chart, microphone etc. Oval and round tables, folding tables also available. Capacity 100 seated. Adjacent coffee room, large kitchen and dedicated bar. Catering can be offered by arrangement. Other rooms within the building for small group work.

ContactName.entry: Mr Shawn Siddall & Mrs Judith Siddall
